entry.source: 〉 A serene-looking dragon is floating{F801}over the deserted lake.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A serene-looking dragon is floating{F801}over the deserted lake.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Dragon of the Lake\0{F87A,-384}{F813,0,609000}You come to this place, sword in{F801}hand...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,609001}Have you come to slay me?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Dragon of the Lake\0{F87A,-384}{F813,0,609000}You come to this place, sword in{F801}hand...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,609001}Have you come to slay me?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Dragon of the Lake\0{F87A,-384}{F813,0,609002}Yet another one... I've lost count{F801}of how many have come before you.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,609003}To think that a mere human would{F801}challenge Long. It would seem you{F801}have a death wish!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Dragon of the Lake\0{F87A,-384}{F813,0,609002}Yet another one... I've lost count{F801}of how many have come before you.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,609003}To think that a mere human would{F801}challenge Long. It would seem you{F801}have a death wish!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Dragon of the Lake\0{F87A,-384}{F813,0,609004}Then leave this place immediately.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Dragon of the Lake\0{F87A,-384}{F813,0,609004}Then leave this place immediately.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Long\0{F87A,-384}{F813,0,609005}To think that there are humans like{F801}you, that wield such great power...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,609006}Let me ask you one thing.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,609007}What do you see us dragons as?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,609008}Enemies to be slain for honor and{F801}glory? As gods of the land?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Long\0{F87A,-384}{F813,0,609005}To think that there are humans like{F801}you, that wield such great power...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,609006}Let me ask you one thing.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,609007}What do you see us dragons as?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,609008}Enemies to be slain for honor and{F801}glory? As gods of the land?{F801}

entry.source: "You are beasts to be slain."{F801}"You are holy spirits."{F801}
entry.target: "You are beasts to be slain."{F801}"You are holy spirits."{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Long\0{F87A,-384}{F813,0,609009}I see... To you, we dragons are{F801}nothing more than monsters.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Long\0{F87A,-384}{F813,0,609009}I see... To you, we dragons are{F801}nothing more than monsters.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Long\0{F87A,-384}{F813,0,609010}I see... Then humans would dare{F801}to oppose the gods as well...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Long\0{F87A,-384}{F813,0,609010}I see... Then humans would dare{F801}to oppose the gods as well...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Long\0{F87A,-384}{F813,0,609011}Either way, the fact remains that{F801}you have defeated me.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,609012}I shall leave this place.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Long\0{F87A,-384}{F813,0,609011}Either way, the fact remains that{F801}you have defeated me.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,609012}I shall leave this place.{F801}
